span.style: font-family: arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span:
Our mission is to educate and prepare our students to become life-long learners and productive citizens while building positive relationships.
Karnack ISD Vision Statement
With our family, success is assured.

Welcome to Karnack Independent School District, home of the Karnack Indians! We are a rural community that sits in northeast Harrison County, only a few short miles away from the most beautiful, natural lake in the state of Texas, Caddo Lake. Karnack Independent School District prides ourselves in providing a “family atmosphere” education to our students. We are known for small classroom sizes, with individual education plans for each child. We believe in taking the time to educate a student above and beyond the state standards by providing opportunities in and out of the classroom that will prepare our students for all future endeavors. Come join us as we grow and move towards becoming the top district in East Texas.

div.div:
655 Fason Street,PO Box 259, Karnack, TX 75661
